snippet: KIRSCHENBAUM--Bernard. The Board and staff of JBI International, Inc. (established in 1931 as The Jewish Braille Institute) offer our heartfelt condolences to our Treasurer and very good friend, Frances Brandt, on the loss of her dear brother, Bernard Kirschenbaum. May his memory serve as a blessing. Judy E. Tenney, Co-Chairman of the Board Steven P. Polivy, Co-Chairman of the Board Dr. Ellen Isler, President & CEO Israel A. Taub, Vice-President & CFO 1/3
lead_paragraph: KIRSCHENBAUM--Bernard. The Board and staff of JBI International, Inc. (established in 1931 as The Jewish Braille Institute) offer our heartfelt condolences to our Treasurer and very good friend, Frances Brandt, on the loss of her dear brother, Bernard Kirschenbaum. May his memory serve as a blessing. Judy E. Tenney, Co-Chairman of the Board Steven P. Polivy, Co-Chairman of the Board Dr. Ellen Isler, President & CEO Israel A. Taub, Vice-President & CFO 1/3
